pages.title: ⎧ Nine of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Spirit of Great Strength$(br)    ☽ Moon in ♐ Sagittarius

Behind we see eight staves, erect in orderly disposition, forming a kind of palisade, or cage.$(br)  A figure stands beyond this confinement, leaning upon the ninth staff and has an expectant look, as if looking forward to the next challenge.$(br)  It is not clear if they are on guard outside or maybe just escaped.$(br)  It may symbolize the liberated spirit, or creative truth; release from darkness and confusion. In a way, this

card show the completion of a process outlined in the other cards, the liberation into pure energy against opposition. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Firm action, release after delay, purity of purpose.$(br)  A single action or piece of knowledge which changes a situation dramatically, especially in the direction of liberation.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Confinement, confusion, the need for a fresh way of looking at the situation.
